question: Assalam mu alaikum. Can one perform nafl salaat after subuh sadiq, ie, before fajr salaat, and fajr athaan.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is Makrooh to recite any Nafl Salaats after Subuh-e-Saadiq with the
exception of the 2 Rakaats of Sunnat of Fajr. (Tahtaawi pg.101)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
